FYI: Startup guide, text is in Slovak but numbered and I think it could help you!
http://fabo.ic.cz/fs/startan2.jpg

Never mind, here is the translation :oP

1. Fuel pumps upper position(???? ???????) 
2. Turn battery and generator on (47 then 46) (upper pos) 
3. Turn starter on(switch ?????? - upper pos) 
4. keep starter spinning until electrics is 40-60 ams (marked - left pos) 
5. Starter swtich to the left until started
6. Starter off (?????? down)

Another hint: Watch temperatures, or you will have problems runnig that engines!

There are two cooling systems - cowl flaps and engine cover that could be adjusted in-flight:

switches 43 and 44 if I remember well.
